name: Future Passing By (Demo)
description:
Summary

Future Passing By is a co-op puzzle game in which a girl from a dystopian future gets help from a man from the past in order to solve puzzles through time based mechanics and the rift line that joins their two time periods.

Initially developed for the 2022 Global Game Jam and then worked on further to create a full demo.

Instructions
  • Move two characters with the WASD and Arrow Keys or Left and Right Stick for Controller
  • Interact with the environment with Left and Right control or Left and Right Trigger for Controller
  • The Rift Line takes the line between the two characters and moves itself accordingly
Tip

If you're having trouble exiting a room due to the Rift Line being a little frustrating to work with, try having both characters an equal distance from the line (essentially side by side) as they walk out.

Music  by SonikBuster

Find them on Twitter, Spotify, Instagram, Bandcamp, and Twitch
